name: Demon: Hell Keeper
description:
Demon: Hell Keeper - is the simplest 2D platformer with surviving elements where you have to do hardcore levels playing as a Demon.
In this game your basic aim is collecting various things getting over different traps on your way. After collecting the items on the level a portal to Demon will be opened and entering it he will be in the underworld.
Please, be very careful and attentive. Think of your every step and movement and the game will be really exciting and thrilling.
